personality_analysis.communication_style: Michel communicates in a clear and engaging manner, often highlighting achievements and team efforts.
personality_analysis.leadership_approach: He adopts a supportive and inclusive leadership style, emphasizing teamwork and collective success.
personality_analysis.decision_making: Michel makes decisions based on thorough analysis and collaboration with his team.
personality_analysis.networking_style: He builds relationships through professional platforms and values mutual support and recognition.
personality_analysis.summary: Michel Galais is an innovative and collaborative technology executive with a strong focus on digital transformation. He values teamwork and is committed to fostering an inclusive and supportive work environment.
